titles.title: A resolution honoring the hockey team of East Side High School in Newark, New Jersey.
A resolution honoring the hockey team of East Side High School in Newark, New Jersey.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Commends: (1) the dedication of the players and coaches of the hockey team of East Side High School in Newark, New Jersey; and (2) the New Jersey Devils for engaging the local community and providing low-income, at-risk children the opportunity to play hockey.
